title: ‘As Motivated as Ever’: Double Olympic Champ Kristin Faulkner Lays Out Major New Ambitions
content:
American star Faulkner retains hunger for success, returns to La Vuelta Femenina one year after career-shaping result.

Read the full article at ‘As Motivated as Ever’: Double Olympic Champ Kristin Faulkner Lays Out Major New Ambitions on Velo.
author: sstokes
